tossup_question: -   –  A wind blowing from 135° equates to the wind coming from which direction?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Northeast
X) Northwest
Y) Southeast
Z) Southwest
bonus_question: -   –  What determines when a tropical depression or storm is given hurricane status?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Wind speed
X) Central pressure
Y) Diameter
Z) Movement velocity
